message.content: {"id": "10022", "title": "Incorrect \"Build\" popup action enablement", "description": "The Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when there are no changes to build.", "OB": "The Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.", "EB": "The Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are changes to build.", "SR": "Fix the enablement logic of the Build action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective so that it is only enabled when there are changes to build."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '10022', 'title': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement', 'description': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'If "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspectiveis always enabled. '}
